abstracts.cdata!:
This is an Implementation Completion
            Note for the amended portion ($2.1 million) of the project.
            This note compliments the Project Completion Report (Report
            no. 10948) completed in 1992. In 1994, the Government
            requested the undisbursed loan balance of $2.1 million be
            used to support activities aimed at policy formulation,
            analysis, and review at the federal level. These activities
            were organized into the Government Transition Technical
            Assistance Program (GTAPP), which included the following
            components: a) execution of a Living Standards Measurement
            Survey; b) preparation of sector policy briefing papers and
            organization of seminars to discuss findings with the
            Government; c) reform of the system for monitoring
            state-owned enterprises; and d) modernization of management
            systems in the Ministry of Finance. By and large the
            activities were completed satisfactorily.
